title: Towel, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; occasional bands of paired weft in different colors; warp overspun Z
description: Woven towel with bands of geometric patterning at both ends. One band is seven inches, and the other is two inches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 1920–30. Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; occasional bands of paired weft in different colors; warp overspun Z. 1974-92-7.
